name: Device Mockups With Long Shadows
description:
Long shadows can make it look like your devices are placed flat on a surface rather than standing up. I created this easy-to-use system to showcase your designs. Enjoy!

Devices included:

  • iPad Pro Portrait (1024x1366)
  • iPad Pro Landscape (1367x1366)
  • iPhone X (375x812)
  • iPhone 13 Pro Max (428x926)
  • Apple Watch 44mm (184x224)
  • Google Pixel 2XL (411x823)
  • Web Browser (1440x900)
  • Icon (128x128)
  • Icon (60x60)
